prompt: Arrange my vacation photos into a colorful grid collage, balancing the sizes and orientation of each shot for a modern, visually striking Instagram-ready layout.
Transform a candid selfie into a hyper-realistic 3D action figure, including detailed clothing textures, glossy toy packaging background, and a dynamic pose ready for display.
Change my pet’s portrait into a vibrant kawaii-style sticker, featuring oversized sparkling eyes, bold cartoon outlines, pastel backgrounds, and playful accessory add-ons like hats and bows.
Remix a group of individual friend portraits into a seamless, natural-looking team photo, matching lighting and perspective, and placing everyone in a fun party backdrop with confetti.
Take a regular landscape snapshot and turn it into a cinematic scene at golden hour, with enhanced sunset lighting, exaggerated lens flares, and warm, glowing highlights on every subject.
Merge two separate photos—one of myself and another of a famous painting—so I appear to be standing perfectly inside the artwork, matched in color, brushstroke texture, and lighting.
Reimagine a classic selfie as an iPhone commercial, applying soft face-smoothing, bright even lighting, subtle lens flare, and a minimalist blurred backdrop reminiscent of Apple promo shots.
Overlay AR-style product labels onto a photo of a bicycle, using floating neon-colored text callouts and semi-transparent frames to highlight the brakes, gears, and frame components.
Transform a candid family photo into a magazine-style cover image, with bold typography, polished skin edits, and a clean studio background for a professional, editorial effect.
Place me in a vibrant 1980s-inspired setting, giving me big retro hair, neon fashion, boom box props, and a background with pixel art arcade machines and flashing lights.
Blend a pet portrait with a painting style, turning my dog’s photo into an oil-on-canvas masterpiece with visible brushstrokes, rich color, and a subtle gallery wall backdrop.
Enhance a business headshot by giving it a futuristic cyberpunk city background, glowing neon edges, high-tech light reflections, and subtle digital glitch effects throughout.
Take a series of event photos and organize them into a stylish, asymmetrical grid with alternating sizes and geometric frames, emulating a high-end fashion collage.
Turn a casual backyard photo into a whimsical fairy tale scene, adding soft pastel colors, floating glimmers, toadstools, butterflies, and magical forest details to the background.
Transform a street-style selfie into a dramatic noir movie poster, bathing everything in stark black and white, adding rain reflections, smoky atmosphere, and high-contrast lighting.
Convert a selfie so it looks like an old vintage polaroid, with a washed-out matte finish, a wide white border, handwritten timestamp in the corner, and a soft indoor flash effect.
Take a food picture and explode ingredients outward from the plate, adding colorful fruit, spices, and swirling smoke in a high-energy, stop-motion-inspired burst for food blog use.
Assemble multiple candid selfies into a photo booth strip, arranging them vertically with high-contrast color frames, playful props, and a classic retro booth background.
Edit a couples’ photo so that the two people are floating above a dreamy, cloud-filled landscape, with glowing heart-shaped lights and a surreal sky in the background.
Place a child in a comic book hero scene, giving them a digitally drawn superhero costume, glowing powers, and a city skyline backdrop with dramatic comic panel effects.
Change a simple product snapshot into a minimalist e-commerce showcase, adding a clean white background, soft drop shadow, subtle product highlights, and crisp floating text.
Transform a pet sitting on the couch into a humorous regal portrait—dress it up in royal attire, position it on a velvet throne, and add a grand palace background for effect.
Take a group of holiday party photos and combine them into a festive montage, layering snow, twinkling string lights, Santa hats, and colorful gift props for a celebratory vibe.
Edit an outdoor workout photo into a high-intensity sports commercial, with sharp motion blur, glowing energy streaks around the subject, and a dark urban background.
Remix a travel selfie so my silhouette is outlined against a multicolored sunset behind a famous landmark, with atmospheric haze and stylized birds flying past for a postcard look.
